overview: Prepares students for algebraic problem solving by strengthening foundational math skills.

modules.title: The Number System
modules.preview: Master integers, rational numbers, and operations foundational to algebra.

modules.title: Exponents & Order of Operations
modules.preview: Apply GEMS (Grouping, Exponents, Multiply/Divide, Add/Subtract) and exponent properties.

modules.title: Variables & Expressions
modules.preview: Identify variables, combine like terms, and apply the distributive property.

modules.title: Checkpoint 1
modules.preview: A quick assessment covering Number System, Exponents, and Variables & Expressions.

modules.title: One- & Two-Step Equations
modules.preview: Use inverse operations to solve linear equations and check solutions.

modules.title: Ratios, Rates & Proportions
modules.preview: Compute unit rates and solve proportions for real-world problems.

modules.title: Percent & Rational Conversions
modules.preview: Convert between fractions, decimals, and percents; calculate percent of a quantity.

modules.title: Checkpoint 2
modules.preview: A mixed assessment on equations, proportions, and percent.

modules.title: Coordinate Plane & Graphing
modules.preview: Plot points, interpret ordered pairs, and recognize linear patterns on a graph.

modules.title: Intro to Functions
modules.preview: Define functions, complete function tables, and distinguish linear vs. non-linear.

modules.title: Slope & Intercept Fundamentals
modules.preview: Calculate slope and interpret linear equations in y = mx + b form.

modules.title: Checkpoint 3
modules.preview: A cumulative assessment on graphing, functions, and slope.

modules.title: Advanced Prep Topics (Optional)
modules.preview: Introduction to polynomials, radicals, quadratics, and systems of equations.

modules.title: Final Mastery Assessment
modules.preview: A comprehensive assessment covering all 'Ready for Algebra 1' modules.
